Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2009 07:21PM macsmom wrote: Hi All...just wanted you all to know your posts helped get me through the dark days of waiting for my biopsy results.... My mammo interpretation left little hope that I would escape the world of breast cancer, and biopsy during the holidays made for a lingering return on the pathology report, with lots of time to educate oneself on a diagnosis I was certain would befall me.   I am, however, here to tell you all never to give up hope. Never.  A friend of mine held my hand during this awful time even though she is 1000 miles away, and I want you to know I am holding all of your hands.  macsmom
Posts.Title: New member ~ waiting on biopsy report. Artemis macsmom
